name: School Panic
description:
Become a good student by finding all the books that are scattered around in the school. Be careful of the bully! 

A note for you : Hello! I'am Rico Margallo 26 years old, A developer of this game. I'm from the Philippines. I just want to tell that i really need a help with my financial needs, If you see the game is free and a donation is optional if you want to help me with my financial please put something on the donation it will help me a lot to feed and pay electricity. I live with my parents and cannot work outside because i need to take care of them. 

If you like and enjoying the game please put some donation it will help me a lot.

Kindness,

Here is my Facebook page! 

https://www.facebook.com/Ricreator
